sentences.sContent: This lack of time socializing with his siblings means that puppy will not develop important canine skills.
sentences.sContent_eng: This lack of time socializing with his siblings means that puppy will not develop important canine skills.
sentences.sCn: 缺少和兄弟姐妹社交培训的小狗们不会提升他自身重要的犬科技能。

sentences.sContent: Veterinarians believe a rise in canine diabetes, along with a surge in feline diabetes, are due to obesity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Veterinarians believe a rise in canine diabetes, along with a surge in feline diabetes, are due to obesity.
sentences.sCn: 兽医们相信犬糖尿病发病率的上升，以及猫糖尿病发病率的激增都是由于肥胖所致。

sentences.sContent: A person bitten by a dog as a child, for instance, might be able to overcome a canine phobia if the old memory can be replaced with a less scary one.
sentences.sContent_eng: A person bitten by a dog as a child, for instance, might be able to overcome a canine phobia if the old memory can be replaced with a less scary one.
sentences.sCn: 比如，一个人在小时候被狗咬过，假使能将他这段记忆换成相对不那么可怕的事情，也许就可以帮助他克服犬恐惧症。

trans.tranOther: one of the four sharp pointed teeth in the front of your mouth
